alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 9:04PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise and Calhoun. .Recent heavy rainfall will continue to cause rises on the Green River into the weekend, with expected crests late in the weekend or early next week. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 24.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.9 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
